Summary: A bright amber light moving towards the right of the moon.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Puchong
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile having a smoke at home in the garden , I gazed at the moon for today being a full moon Suddenly out of nowhere my eye caught a bright glowing orange light much like the shape of a star but with 4 points. It looked bigger than the planet which is visable almost daily in the night sky. I first thought that it was a plane but there was no sound or gas trail. It moved towards the right from the moon. It's movement was steady in a straight but sightly curved line for about a minute with glowing amber light. It dipped slightly with a wobbled for about 2 seconds and started gaining speed upwards before disappearing into the sky and was not visable. I's flight pattern was not a all like a plane either. It's not a commet for there were no tail it was'nt a shooting star either. Please verify if this is a ufo or not.
